description: We're thrilled to introduce our four newest family members. These adorable furry additions to our household are two-month-old Chihuahuas. Not only are they incredibly playful, but they also have quite the appetite. Let us introduce them: Lana, our precious little girl; Johnny, the feistiest and bravest of the pack; Taylor, the one destined for stardom; and Bob, our charming little boy.
